    Intro to Case Management Presentation

    The following is a Microsoft PowerPoint Slideshow I created and used when a co-woker requested that I speak about case management at Heritage University for her Social Work Theory class.

    The graphic I used for PowerPoint presentation about Case Management

    I have uploaded the PowerPoint Presentation to SlideShare and you can view the embedded presentation below or download the original presentation.

    Introduction to Case Management Presentation from Jacob Campbell

    The presentation included a video I downloaded and embedded into the presentation off of YouTube. You can check out Social Service Delivery I thought it was pretty funny and good way to think about how to not do case management.
